GIVE SOMEONE THE ULTIMATE GIFT

No more compromising, no more excuses, everyone can look and feel fabulous.

LUXURY GIFT BOX

includes:


dress and obi belt

or

top and skirt

Price: HKD 2,800

1. Buy

BUY a beautifully wrapped gift box - with fabric swatches, dress ideas and a tape measure. If you need it immediately, buy an e-voucher.

2. Send

Send to a loved one, friend or colleague.

3. Design

They DESIGN either

  • their perfect dress and belt
  • or their perfect skirt and top

We hope that the designer will CHERISH their creation.

But if it is not exactly how they dreamt it would be we will provide up to 300HKD for local tailoring, remake it free-of-charge or offer a full refund if returned unworn within 30 days of purchase*

* local tailoring cost refunded based on a receipt for work done and all garments to be returned must have the return tag intact in the garment.
